name: Ball Pit Simulator
description: YOU ARE TRAPPED IN A CURSED BALL PIT, HOW WILL YOU ESCAPE? Ball Pit Simulator is the first game to take place entirely in the realms of a ball pit however, it is not all fun and games. You will have to survive traversing the mysterious ball pit by jumping, running, and crawling. There is danger in every corner from endless pits, traps, and even monsters. There is only one rule in the ball pit, don't touch the green balls. Sounds easy right?
